attributes.action: Permenantly Cancel Stamp Duty on All House Sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government want people to buy their own houses rather than rent. First Time buyers are finding it harder and harder to afford to buy homes. If this unfair tax is canceled it will go some way to help all concerned & stimulate the housing market.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
